Schema.sap:Label: RFQ Management Service
Schema.sap:QuickInfo: Service for managing Request for Quotation processes, including RFQ creation, supplier management, and workflow tracking

FunctionImport.sap:QuickInfo: Action to create a new Request for Quotation

FunctionImport.sap:QuickInfo: Action to award or reject an RFQ bid

Property.sap:QuickInfo: Official registered name of the company or business unit

Property.sap:QuickInfo: City location of the company headquarters or registration

Property.sap:Label: Currency Key
Property.sap:QuickInfo: Default currency code used by the company for financial operations
